thread.title: BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Announces CPUC Approval For Final Decision In Unit's Application

title: BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Announces CPUC Approval For Final Decision In Unit's Application

organizations.name: brief-pacific gas and electric announces cpuc approval for final decision in unit
final decision in unit's application reuters staff

text:
January 11, 2018 / 8:05 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Announces CPUC Approval For Final Decision In Unit's Application Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Pacific Gas And Electric Co: 
* PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC CO -‍ CPUC APPROVED A FINAL DECISION IN CO‘S UNIT‘S APPLICATION TO RETIRE DIABLO CANYON NUCLEAR POWER PLANT IN 2024 AND 2025​ 
* PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC SAYS ‍IN ITS DECISION, CPUC APPROVED UNIT'S PROPOSAL TO RETIRE DIABLO CANYON UNIT 1 BY 2024, UNIT 2 BY 2025​ - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2D5L7ss ) Further company coverage:
